arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo tipped to complete shock purchase of LaLiga club - on one condition
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo wants to add an elite football club to his business portfolio and identified a team to buy, but the five-time Ballon d'Or winner is unwilling to compromise on one aspect

arts.ttl: Ronaldo double gives Al Nassr Riyadh derby win
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo scored twice in the second half, including a penalty, to guide Al-Nassr to a 3-1 win over Al-Hilal in the race for the Saudi Pro League title on Friday.

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo 'tipped to take over LaLiga club but only if ONE condition is met' - months after superstar opened up on ownership plans
arts.sum: Cristiano Ronaldo has been sensationally tipped to become the owner of a LaLiga side, according to a report.

arts.ttl: Last chance saloon for Cristiano Ronaldo
arts.sum: No player has scored more goals than Cristiano Ronaldo this season in the Saudi league. Now, he’ll try to carry that form into the Saudi Pro League, where he’s chasing his 930th career goal and hoping to spark a dramatic late charge for the title.

arts.ttl: Georgina Rodríguez shows her most hated side of CR7 playing paddle confirming couples end up looking alike
arts.sum: While many admire that kind of focus, others see it as "too much" especially coming from someone like Georgina, who could easily lean on the luxury of her life and stay in the comfort zone. I t's no secret that some people love Cristiano Ronaldo and others absolutely can't stand him.

arts.ttl: Pioli emerges as Ranieri’s favourite candidate for Roma job
arts.sum: La Gazzetta dello Sport reports Stefano Pioli is Claudio Ranieri’s favourite candidate for the Roma...

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo tipped to purchase La Liga club
arts.sum: Former Real Madrid star Cristiano Ronaldo has this week been credited with a fresh interest in the purchase of a La Liga club. The outfit in question? Valencia. Amid an…

arts.ttl: Cristiano Ronaldo tipped to partner Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney in new Wrexham ownership
arts.sum: Wrexham have been tipped to enjoy even more success if Cristiano Ronaldo buys into the League One club alongside current owners Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney

arts.ttl: Wrexham 'could be bought by Cristiano Ronaldo' - and keep Ryan Reynolds involved
arts.sum: Global superstar Cristiano Ronaldo has been tipped to become involved in League One side Wrexham when he retires alongside Hollywood stars Ryan Reynolds and Rob McElhenney
